column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Out of all the deep dish pizza chains
column2: lou's is probably one of the better ones. They have the perfect ratio of toppings and sauce. Not a fan of the ridiculous amounts of cheese like other chains but lou's has a great balance of cheese to sauce. Crust is the most important part of pizza for me and they nailed it with the butter crust. Buttery
column5: was really surprised by the lou's classic. I always get meat on my pizza but the classic was a veggie pizza and didn't expect to have so much flavor. That's definitely my favorite piiza at Lou's.
